law.history: Repealed 2015 Ky. Acts ch. 19, sec. 45, effective June 24, 2015. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. IV, sec. 20(2); and ch. 142, sec. 1, effective June 21, 1974.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Recognition of corporate limits and population of city government units prior to merger into urban-county government -- Recognition of boundaries of service districts.
